channel.title: How can you change the amount of xp u get when u hit 1
channel.description:
hey guys i can't remember how to change amount of xp u get i only remember that it was in player.java i did it and i became level 146 instead of 126?
if i hit 1 in my source i get 750xp i want to make it to 200xp can anyone tell me.

item.title: How can you change the amount of xp u get when u hit 1
item.dc:creator: @SivanScape SivanScape
item.description:
@SivanScape wrote:

ty

item.title: How can you change the amount of xp u get when u hit 1
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

Open client.java in your server folder.
Search for

TotalExp = (double)

For me its

TotalExp = (double) (570 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive {

The 570 for me is XP per 1 hit.

Change it for your 200.

Read full topic
